main event: A civilian observed a stationary UFO in Brentwood, Long Island, New York on October 29, 1966.
interesting points: The observer witnessed a large bright blue-white light that appeared to shine down on the object or emerged from it,The observed object accelerated rapidly after being stationary for a period of 3-4 minutes,Photographs taken by the witness showed an additional unexplained object in the frame,The object was described as having a bluish-green color and changing colors slightly during the sighting,There was no sound associated with the object during the observation.
witness description: a civilian who reported the sighting and took photographs
